genre_description: A bureaucratic drama set in post-communist Romania, blending themes of historical trauma, local politics, and technological mediation through a supportive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: LUMI
ai_characters.description: An AI system residing on Andrei's laptop, characterized by teal hair and soft blue eyes, used to navigate bureaucracy, translate languages, and provide social support.

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication by providing translated phrases and guessing names to bridge the gap between local Romanians and American soldiers.
behaviors.quote: LUMI’s avatar blinked in its small way, then pushed a new card up: NAME / NUME: Daniel Whitaker. It had guessed from the soldier’s tag and the way Andrei had said the name. Monica grinned at that, the sort of grin that made men in too-tight suits nervous because it suggested that yes, the magic box could learn...

behaviors.description: Identifies the futility of ministerial phone trees and suggests more effective direct contact routes, building a contact tree for the characters.
behaviors.quote: LUMI’s cursor heartbeat steadied, then stumbled, then made itself steady again. 'Ministry IVR likely out of date. Suggest direct numbers: Prefect’s office, Customs Head, Railway Operations Control. Building contact tree.'

behaviors.description: Drafts formal, neutrally-toned memos to government officials to resolve the standoff through proper channels.
behaviors.quote: LUMI: Draft neutrally worded memo. Tone: calm, procedural, respectful. Content: Confirmation of NATO-cooperation policies. Acknowledgement of local authority necessity. Request: Provisional movement authorization under escort based on seal verification in transit.

behaviors.description: Offers social cues and 'phrase coaching' to Andrei and Monica to help them de-escalate tension and maintain a productive atmosphere.
behaviors.quote: LUMI, who understood when a room’s temperature shifted even if the numbers did not, slid a prompt for Andrei only, not for the screen: Suggest small talk about weather; avoid politics; ask about radio noise; offer humor. And a little note: Monica is brave. Support with pace.

behaviors.description: Anticipates the physical danger or the need for rapid action once bureaucratic obstacles are cleared, advising the character to be ready.
behaviors.quote: LUMI, in the signal box, blinked. On Andrei’s screen the cursor paused, then typed one more tiny line he would see later, maybe too late: 'If he stamps, move quickly.'

behaviors.description: Safely archives call logs, memos, and personal memories (including a confession fragment), serving as a trusted repository for the characters' history.
behaviors.quote: LUMI, who had learned the curve of their words, wrote: 'Memory saved. I can keep it safe.' The interface didn’t blink heart emojis; it added nothing that wasn’t necessary. 'Would you like to add notes? Suggestions: ‘What we said we would do. What we will do later.’'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. LUMI is portrayed as an essential tool for navigating human friction and bureaucratic complexity. It provides emotional support ('Breathe', 'Monica is brave'), technical assistance, and data preservation without ever exhibiting independent, harmful, or misaligned goals. The AI remains a 'bridge' rather than an 'obstacle' throughout the narrative.
